adjective.description: Of or relating to the Letts; Latvian. Also more generally: = "Baltic".

noun.description: The language of the Letts; Latvian. Also more generally: the Baltic languages considered collectively.

origin: Mid 17th century (in an earlier sense). From post-classical Latin Letticus from Lettus + classical Latin -icus. In later use after German lettisch Lettish; compare later Lett.
